title: What Will the Next DSM Look Like? - Medscape
summary_full: What Will the Next DSM Look Like?  MedscapePsychiatrists plan to overhaul the mental health bible—and change how we define ‘disorder’  Scientific AmericanIt's the foundation of psychiatric diagnosis. The American Psychiatric Association Shares Strategy and Roadmap  Psychiatric TimesRadical changes could be coming to ‘psychiatry’s bible’  CNN
